bibl.title: A Periphery on the Periphery of the Ancient World? Ancient Nubia in Six New Books on the Middle Nile Region. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Stanley M. BURSTEIN, Graeco-Africana. Studies in the History of Greek Relations with Egypt and Nubia (New Rochelle, N.Y., 1995); - David N. EDWARDS, The Archaeology of the Meroitic State. New Perspectives on Its Social and Political Organisation (Oxford, 1996); - David O'CONNOR, Ancient Nubia: Egypt's Rival in Africa (Philadelphia, 1993); - Peter L. SHINNIE, Ancient Nubia (London - New York, 1996); - Derek A. WELSBY, The Kingdom of Kush: The Napatan and Meroitic Empire (London, 1996); - Dietrich WILDUNG (Ed.), Sudan: Ancient Kingdoms of the Nile (Paris - New York, 1997); - IDEM, Sudan, Antike Königreiche am Nil (Tübingen, 1996).
